LISTPURCHASES_PURCHASED: You have purchased {Products}.  What else can I help you with?
LISTPURCHASES_NONE: You haven't purchased any products for Slot Machine. What else can I help you with?
LISTPURCHASES_REPROMPT: What else can I help you with?

PURCHASE_PRODUCT_LIST.coinreset: a Reset Bankroll subscription which will automatically reset your bankroll whenever you run out of coins
PURCHASE_PRODUCT_LIST.crazydiamond: a Crazy Diamond machine with wild diamond symbols
PURCHASE_PRODUCT_LIST.holiday: a Holiday machine with yuletide sounds and symbols
PURCHASE_PRODUCT_LIST.valentine: a Valentine's Day game with special valentine symbols
PURCHASE_PRODUCT_LIST.halloween: a Halloween game with special spooky symbols
PURCHASE_PRODUCT_LIST.independenceday: an Independence Day machine with special symbols and sound effects
PURCHASE_PRODUCT_LIST.circus: a circus machine with a wild clown symbol and special sound effects

PURCHASE_PRODUCTS: We have {Products} available for purchase. Say the product you would like to buy or no to continue your game.
PURCHASE_NO_PRODUCTS: Sorry. We don't have any new products available to purchase.
PURCHASE_CONFIRM_REPROMPT: Say the product you want to buy or no to continue your game.
PURCHASE_NO_PURCHASE: What else can I help you with?
REFUND_SAY_PRODUCT: Say the name of the product you want to refund such as Cancel Crazy Diamonds or Cancel Reset Bankroll.
